page.title: 03Tuxford Comp. School 3
page.content:
were new, and modern. The oldest buildings were the upper school and science, craft and artrooms and many more. The number of pupils are about eight hundred. We met some girls who took us around the school.
INSIDE THE BUILDINGS
1. The upper school entrances are the largest.
2. There are 8O rooms in the Tuxford Comprehensive school.
3. They are used for six form study, History, French, German, Controlled Tech, Metalwork, Woodwork, R.S. Library and I.S.
4. The hall is 23 years old. The
